comments.body:
The usual is to see `;;` after each option including the `*)` one.

Also, the usual indentation is that `;;` indents with the commands and not with the case option.

``` shell
...
  Linux)
    host_os=linux
    ;;
  *)
    echo "Unsupported host OS.  Must be Linux or Mac OS X." >&2
    exit 1
    ;;
esac
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@  *)
    echo "Unsupported host OS.  Must be Linux or Mac OS X." >&2
    exit 1
    ;;
esac
